publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7474.1 Derek Brownlee: A Budget for Scotland’s People—As an amendment to motion (S3M-7474) in the name of Johann Lamont, insert at end ", and believes that the Public Finance and Accountability (Scotland) Act 2000 should be amended to place a duty on the Scottish Government to produce in each UK spending review year such indicative annual figures for the whole period for which the UK Government has set out totals for the Scottish Government."
